entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
